title: A brief account of Mr. Valentine Greatraks, and divers of the strange cures by him lately performed written by himself in a letter addressed to the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esq. ; whereunto are annexed the testimonials of several eminent and worthy persons of the chief matters of fact therein related.
author: Greatrakes, Valentine, 1629-1683.
notes: An answer to: Wonders no miracles / by David Lloyd.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
